title: Thermal power to stay till round-the-clock renewable energy is available: R K Singh
description: Union Power Minister R K Singh has said that conventional thermal power capacity will continue to play an important role till round-the-clock renewable power is available. He drew attention towards rising power demand which grew by over 20 per cent in August, September and October as well.
